title: [SOLVED]820-2936 Clean ME issue?
message:
i got a board which was water damaged i revived it but had EFI password. removed it and even did the clean me process on bootup it ran really slow.

are these boards affected if clean me isnt right?
could it be something else?
also i tested this board with everything unplugged just a usb mouse, usb ssd and display port to a monitor.

title: [SOLVED]820-2936 Clean ME issue?
message: Run ASD and check if give you any sensor error, of course could be a bad ME region too....

title: [SOLVED]820-2936 Clean ME issue?
message:
i will run asd shortly here are the bios files i used maybe someone can check them and see if i did clean me right and correct it if not?

title: [SOLVED]820-2936 Clean ME issue?
message: i guess this was another case of everything needs to be connected to run fast. im assuming certain bios require it cause ive gotten a mixed batch of boards that run fine without everything connected. well its working now. thanks.
